@@ -0,0 +1,53 @@
+import 'package:digitalksp/widgets/buttons_widget.dart';
+import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
+
+class LatestBlogList extends StatelessWidget {
+  const LatestBlogList({super.key});
+
+  @override
+  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
+    return SizedBox(
+      height: 100.0,
+      child: Column(
+        crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,
+        children: [
+          HeadlineSection(headline: 'Latest blogs', showMore: true),
+        ],
+      ),
+    );
+  }
+}
+
+class HeadlineSection extends StatelessWidget {
+  const HeadlineSection(
+      {super.key, required this.headline, this.showMore = false});
+
+  final String headline;
+  final bool showMore;
+  final VoidCallback? onTap;
+
+  @override
+  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
+    return Padding(
+      padding: const EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 16.0),
+      child: Row(
+        children: [
+          Expanded(
+            child: Text(headline,
+                style: Theme.of(context)
+                    .textTheme
+                    .headlineSmall
+                    ?.copyWith(fontWeight: FontWeight.w600)),
+          ),
+          SizedBox(width: showMore ? 10.0 : 0.0),
+          showMore
+              ? SmallTextButton(
+                  label: 'View all',
+                  onTap: onTap ?? null,
+                )
+              : const SizedBox(),
+        ],
+      ),
+    );
+  }
+}
